The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 05 April is 41,532 (4,807.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 March, there were 185 new confirmed cases (21.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 March, there were 232 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (47 fewer cases).
